title: BELGIAN NATIONAL FINAL 1998
text:
BELGIAN NATIONAL FINAL 1998
BELGIUM
"Dis oui" - Mélanie Cohl
"Say yes, you know the earth is beautiful, say yes, when we are unanimous"
French-Belgian Finals tend not to be as good as Flemish-Belgian Finals, and this one was no exception, but the best song did win, although there were a couple of others that were OK, amongst a lot of old-fashioned French chansons. The final was held at the RTBF Studios in Brussels on March 13th. The winner was chosen by televoting. Melanie was 2nd favourite to win the Eurovision, but actually came 6th.
1 Rien qu'une passagère Only a passenger girl Alexis 2661 5th 2 Ferme la porte á tes larmes Close the door to your tears Betty 1761 7th 3 Dans quel monde In which world Valérie Buggea 1131 10th 4 Ton image Your image Curt Close 2503 6th 5 Dis oui Say yes Mélanie Cohl 15424 1st 6 Pour t'entendre Just to hear you Alain Colard 2700 4th 7 Ma séduction My attractiveness Maira 1217 9th 8 Ils sont là They are there Les Mas 11021 2nd 9 Tant besoin de toi So much need for you Dida Robbert 1227 8th 10 Tu es libre You are free Manon Selyn 4831 3rd
FINNISH NATIONAL FINAL 1998
1998 NATIONAL FINALS
